name: Civilian
description: Be the normal, boring person you are.

name: Detective
description: Investigate one person each night for a clue to their role.

name: Doctor
description: Heal one person each night, preventing them from dying.

name: Mafia
description: Plot to kill one of the civilians each night.

name: King Mafia
description: Plot to kill an extra civilian each night. Takes two investigations to reveal this role.

name: Joker
description: The ultimate wild card. Side with the Mafia and choose to kill an extra player, or be the saviour and protect a civilian, or probe into the Mafia ranks by investigating players.

name: Terrorist
description: A suicide bomber. Choose to take a player along when you explode during the day phase.

name: Silencer
description: Mafia-aligned. At night, mutes a person. That person cannot speak during the next day. The target may still vote.

name: Hex Master
description: May switch any two people during the night. Any action aimed at one of the switched people will hit the other instead.

name: Ghost
description: Comes back to talk during the day phase after being killed.
